plot: Rosita, a voluminous and temperamental diva of the opera, precipitately abandoned the shoot of "Tristan and Isolde" in Hollywood on hearing that the producer isn't going to offer her the leading role in his next film, "Romeo and Juliette".
title: Rosita, please!
plot_es: Rosita, a voluminous and temperamental diva of the opera, precipitately abandoned the shoot of "Tristan and Isolde" in Hollywood on hearing that the producer isn't going to offer her the leading role in his next film, "Romeo and Juliette".
plot_en: Rosita, a voluminous and temperamental diva of the opera, precipitately abandoned the shoot of "Tristan and Isolde" in Hollywood on hearing that the producer isn't going to offer her the leading role in his next film, "Romeo and Juliette".

produce.name: Els Films de la Rambla S.A.
